ad vīllam

Chapter 3

cadō
cadere
to fall
derivative: decadent, cadence, cascade
clamō
clamāre
to shout
derivative: exclamatory
fēmina
fēminae f.
woman
gemō
gemere
to groan
hortus
hortī m.
garden
derivative: horticulture

īrāta, īrātum
angry
derivative: irate
labōrō
labōrāre
to work
derivative: elaborate
multī
multae, multa

derivative: multitude, multiply

puerī m.
boy
qui
m.
who (statement)

rīdēre

derivative: derision, ridiculous

derivative: servitude, servile

Infinitive Conjugations

cadere
3rd Conjugation
to fall
clāmāre
1st Conjugation
to shout

3rd Conjugation
to groan

1st Conjugation
